A '''miner pottery sherd''' is a [[pottery sherd]] that depicts a [[pickaxe]]. It can be found in [[desert pyramid]]s.

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Breaking a [[decorated pot]] causes it to drop all of the [[brick]]s and pottery sherds used to craft it, meaning it drops each of the miner pottery sherds that were used to craft it.

=== Generated loot ===
{{LootChestItem|miner-pottery-sherd}}

== Usage ==
=== Crafting ingredient ===
Miner pottery sherds can be used to craft decorated pots.

{{Crafting
|ingredients=Miner Pottery Sherd<br>
Any combination of 3:
* Other [[Pottery Sherd]]s
* [[Brick]]s
|B1= Miner Pottery Sherd; {Any Pottery Sherd}; {Any Pottery Sherd}; {Any Pottery Sherd}
|A2= {Any Pottery Sherd}; Miner Pottery Sherd; {Any Pottery Sherd}; {Any Pottery Sherd}
|C2= {Any Pottery Sherd}; {Any Pottery Sherd}; Miner Pottery Sherd; {Any Pottery Sherd}
|B3= {Any Pottery Sherd}; {Any Pottery Sherd}; {Any Pottery Sherd}; Miner Pottery Sherd
|Output= Decorated Pot
|type= Decoration block
|ignoreusage=1
}}
